en-US.name: Valentine's Day Machine
en-US.summary: Adds a valentine's day themed machine to the list of games you can play
en-US.description: This adds a valentine's day machine featuring special symbols to the list of games you can play
examplePhrases: Alexa, give me the valentines day machine
Alexa, buy the valetnines day game

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: This will add the Valentine's Day Machine to the list of slot machines you can play.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congratulations! You can now access the Valentine's Day Machine by saying select a new machine.

testingInstructions: After purchasing, the Valentine's Day Machine will show up in the list of games you can play when you say Select a new machine
